nodes.excerpt: Daily-curated Remote Jobs for Everyone Features: - simple list (Hacker News style) - simple & fast search powered by Algolia - only the latest jobs from the last 30 days - no long descriptions, just simple titles and links - no ads - simple email newsletter
nodes.title: Remotelane 3.0 - Remote jobs for everyone with the most simple ux and search
nodes.author: ronatory

localize.description: 每日-为每个人策划的远程工作功能：-简单列表(黑客新闻风格)-由Algolia提供支持的简单快速搜索-仅限过去30天的最新工作-没有详细描述，只有简单的标题和链接-没有广告-简单的电子邮件时事通讯
localize.tagline: 通过最简单的用户体验和搜索，为每个人提供远程作业

localize.tagline: 通過最簡單的用戶體驗和搜索，爲每個人提供遠程作業

nodes.excerpt: Elza browser is not a replacement for your web browser but a powerful tool when you would like to keep your browsing private. Elza is always on incognito with an option to turn on Tor which runs much faster than even the Tor Browser. #Minimal #Fast #Private
nodes.title: Elza Browser - Fast, private, and minimal web browser.
nodes.author: Nitin Sudhakar

localize.description: ELZA浏览器不是您的Web浏览器的替代品，而是当您想要保持您的浏览隐私时的一个功能强大的工具。Elza总是隐姓埋名，可以选择打开Tor，它的运行速度甚至比Tor浏览器都快得多。#最小值 #快速 #私有
localize.tagline: 快速、私密且最小的Web浏览器。

localize.description: ELZA瀏覽器不是您的Web瀏覽器的替代品，而是當您想要保持您的瀏覽隱私時的一個功能強大的工具。Elza總是隱姓埋名，可以選擇打開Tor，它的運行速度甚至比Tor瀏覽器都快得多。#最小值 #快速 #私有
localize.tagline: 快速、私密且最小的Web瀏覽器。

nodes.excerpt: Make Writing a Habit. Write for at least 10 minutes a day for the next 90 days. Tweet your progress each day with the #90DaysOfProse hashtag.
nodes.title: #90DaysOfProse - Make writing a habit
nodes.author: Daniel K. Hunter

localize.description: 让写作成为一种习惯。在接下来的90天里，每天至少写10分钟。每天用#90DaysOfProse 标签推特你的进展。
localize.tagline: 让写作成为一种习惯

nodes.excerpt: For anyone wanting to improve their wellness and achieve their goals, the HistoricalMe app is your private, online space that makes it simple to record and track all elements of your daily life. Find out more about you with this diary app in 2021.
nodes.title: HistoricalMe - Diarise, organise and realise.
nodes.author: John Kellett

localize.description: 对于任何想要改善健康和实现目标的人来说，HistoricalMe应用程序是你的私人在线空间，可以方便地记录和跟踪你日常生活的所有要素。2021年使用这款日记应用了解更多关于你的信息。
localize.tagline: 分化、组织和实现。

localize.description: 對於任何想要改善健康和實現目標的人來說，HistoricalMe應用程序是你的私人在線空間，可以方便地記錄和跟蹤你日常生活的所有要素。2021年使用這款日記應用瞭解更多關於你的信息。
localize.tagline: 分化、組織和實現。

nodes.excerpt: "Every day, it gets a little easier. But you gotta do it every day, that's the hard part". Everyday helps you break goals down into tasks we can execute on every day, colouring our beautiful board whilst forming new habits, ultimately reaching our goals.
nodes.title: Everyday 2.0 - Simple & beautiful habit tracker for the Web, iOS & Android
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: “每一天，事情都会变得容易一些。但你必须每天都去做，这是最难的部分。”每天帮助你将目标分解成我们每天可以执行的任务，在形成新习惯的同时，给我们美丽的黑板涂上色彩，最终实现我们的目标。
localize.tagline: 简单美观的网络、iOS和Android习惯跟踪器

nodes.title: S&P 500 ends the year up 18.5%, besting all wall street forecasts in spite of a global pandemic, the largest quarterly economic contraction ever (Q2), and the highest intra-year Unemployment Rate (14.7%) since the Great Depression. $SPX https://t.co/0BUIKvxxMY
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 标准普尔500指数(S&amp；P500)年底上涨了18.5%，超过了华尔街的所有预测，尽管全球疫情肆虐，第二季度经济出现有史以来最大规模的收缩，年内失业率(14.7%)也是大萧条(Great Depression)以来的最高水平。https://t.co/0BUIKvxxMY px斯普林特
標準普爾500指數(S&amp；P500)年底上漲了18.5%，超過了華爾街的所有預測，儘管全球疫情肆虐，第二季度經濟出現有史以來最大規模的收縮，年內失業率(14.7%)也是大蕭條(Great Depression)以來的最高水平。https://t.co/0BUIKvxxMY px斯普林特

nodes.excerpt: PictureThis® identifies 1,000,000+ plants every day with 98% accuracy-better than most human experts. Get your gardening questions answered and become a “green thumb”! Simply take a photo of the plant and PictureThis answers all the questions for you!

nodes.author: Chris Messina
